headline: 75-year-old fast food chain closing 200 restaurants, fights to survive
summary: When people get more conservative with spending, it hurts restaurants that lack a true following. Some people love chains such as Chipotle, Chick-fil-A, Starbucks, and even McDonald's. They view spending money at those brands as a reasonable indulgence, something they may not truly be able to ...

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock Worth Your Attention and 2 We Avoid
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is home to the biggest and most well-known companies in the market, making it a go-to index for investors seeking stability. But not all large-cap stocks are created equal - some are struggling with slowing growth, declining margins, or increased competition.

raw.headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock Worth Your Attention and 2 We Avoid
